item.title: Several bags of waste dumped, 5th August
item.description:
Thanks for clearing yesterday’s flytipping in this spot. Again dumping has occurred at the same location - this time multiple bags of what look like green / garden waste. As an aside could a sign or camera be used to deter this activity.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Turney Road SE21 8LU outside house number 4(b) ne, 5th August
item.description:
Turney Road SE21 8LU outside house number 4(b) next to Dalkeith Road junction – “Turney Road” street name board graffiti tagged the other day. Name board is vinyl type – see picture. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/place/211+Rosendale+Rd,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8LW/@51.4448588,-0.0980338,3a,18.8y,62.68h,78.06t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1saq38EfGgFIaxw1Q39W3dAQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D11.940656199361214%26panoid%3Daq38EfGgFIaxw1Q39W3dAQ%26yaw%3D62.680728056466485!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x487604092044960f:0x3e79e9ca936c0c79!8m2!3d51.4441556!4d-0.0982163!16s%2Fg%2F11cpjwc21_?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDgwMy4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Turney Road, Tulse Hill, London

item.title: Broken branch overhanging pavement, 5th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 238, Dupree Road, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Abandoned bicycle, 5th August
item.description:
This bicycle has been locked to the same railing for over a year. It has not moved at any time in that period and is clearly abandoned. It is an obstruction and a trip hazard. There appears to be no way of reporting abandoned bicycles apart from ones owned by rental companies. It is at the top of the stairs from Blandford Road to Beckenham Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blandford Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree that needs tidying up, 5th August
item.description:
The tree outside my house at 72 Oakdene Ave BR7 6EB has become quite overgrown to the point where the branches are overhanging my drive and the road. It is making a mess on my drive with the fruit and the leaves when they fall and also blocking out light to my house. I would be grateful if this tree could be refunded a little to make it a bit smaller. Thank you in advance and hope to hear back. Regards Remzi Mustafa

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakdene Avenue, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown Hedges from Property, 5th August
item.description:
I walk regularly to exercise and on my journey along the A10 the hedges on a certain property are over hanging so much that to avoid them myself and I should imagine other pedestrians have to step onto the cycle lane to avoid walking into them, yesterday when passing by I noticed bramble branches which have sharp thorns coming through the growth. these can cause injury if they are not seen. The property in question is 25 Carlton Terrace N18 1LB
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Cambridge Road, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
